Title: Evil Bong 2: King Bong
Actors: Brett Chukerman, Sonny Carl Davis, Mitch Eakins
Plot: Stoners Larnell, Brett, and Bachman all suffer from severe delayed side effects from smoking grass from evil bong Ebee. The trio embark on a journey to the jungle in South America along with their nerdy straight-laced buddy Allist...
